content: a beanie is an excellent project for beginner crocheters it s relatively easy and quick beanies often require only a single skein of yarn making it a budget-friendly and accessible project for those who are just starting terms us yarn weight dk the yarn i used women s institute premium acrylic yarn 100g shade fox rust 67 hook 3 5 mm other tools scissors measuring tape yarn needle and stitch markers if you don t have markers you can use bobby pins instead i ve made this pattern free as an example i understand that buying a pattern from a designer for the first time can be intimidating despite all the descriptions and information it feels like you re purchasing a black box so i want to show you how my tutorials look in most cases my patterns include a pdf written instructions photos and charts along with a video unless stated otherwise i hope you find my tutorial helpful don t forget to mention me if you decide to share your beanie if you enjoy this tutorial you re welcome to explore and purchase my other tutorials
